item.title: Delta-Aeromexico alliance in jeopardy as Trump administration imposes limits on Mexican flights
item.description: Mexico is the top foreign destination for Americans with more than 40 million passengers flying there last year.

item.title: Powell once said he couldn’t imagine leaving the Fed early—other than dying. ‘You will not see me getting in the lifeboat’

item.title: The CEO caught hugging his HR chief at a Coldplay show has resigned after being placed on leave amid an investigation
item.description: “The Board will begin a search for our next Chief Executive as Cofounder and Chief Product Officer Pete DeJoy continues to serve as interim CEO.”
